questions: How many patients have the allergy described as {allergy_description}?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX pl: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#PlainLiteral> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?patientId) as ?count) WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:description '{allergy_description}'^^pl:; syn:patientId ?patientId. }}
cypher: MATCH (p:Patient)-[:HAS_ALLERGY]->(a:Allergy {{description: '{allergy_description}'}}) RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS numberOfPatients;

sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT DISTINCT ?description WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:encounterId ?encounterId. ?encounter a syn:Encounter; syn:id ?encounterId; syn:description ?description. }}

questions: Which patient had the allergy with the code {allergy_code}?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT DISTINCT ?first ?last WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:patientId ?patientId. ?Patient a syn:Patient; syn:id ?patientId; syn:first ?first ; syn:last ?last. }}

questions: How many patients have or had the allergy with the code {allergy_code}?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?patientId) as ?count) WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:patientId ?patientId. }}
cypher: MATCH (p:Patient)-[:HAS_ALLERGY]->(a:Allergy {{code: '{allergy_code}'}}) RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS numberOfPatients;

questions: Can you give me the SNOMED code for the allergy with the code {allergy_code}?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT DISTINCT ?code WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:code ?code. }}

questions: Can you tell me when the allergy with the code {allergy_code} was recorded?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT ?startDate WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:startDate ?startDate. }}

questions: Please provide me the encounters that are related to the allergy with the code {allergy_code}.
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT DISTINCT ?description WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:encounterId ?encounterId. ?encounter a syn:Encounter; syn:id ?encounterId; syn:description ?description. }}

questions: Please provide me the patients with the allergy with the code {allergy_code}.
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT DISTINCT ?first ?last WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:patientId ?patientId. ?Patient a syn:Patient; syn:id ?patientId; syn:first ?first ; syn:last ?last. }}

questions: Can you provide the count of patients suffering from the allergy with the code {allergy_code}?
sparql: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX syn: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX snomed: <https://knacc.umbc.edu/dae-young/kim/ontologies/synthea#snomed:SNOMED-CT> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?patientId) as ?count) WHERE {{ ?allergy a syn:Allergy ; syn:code '{allergy_code}'^^snomed:; syn:patientId ?patientId. }}
cypher: MATCH (p:Patient)-[:HAS_ALLERGY]->(a:Allergy {{code: '{allergy_code}'}}) RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS numberOfPatients;
